original_title: Behind the Fallout: The Making of 'M:I-6'
overview: A seven-part documentary featuring cast and crew examining story/characters, cast and performances, stunts and action, photography, and sets/locations. It emphasizes the stunts and uses the usual hyperbolic tone typical of programs for Cruise films. (1) Light the Fuse, (2) Top of the World, (3) The Big Swing: Deleted Scene Breakdown, (4) Rendezvous in Paris, (5) The Fall, (6) The Hunt Is On and (7) Cliffside Clash.
title: Behind the Fallout: The Making of 'M:I-6'
